tool_description: Search Jobs posted on Linkedin. This one is best used in association with our Indeed Jobs search (https://rapidapi.com/jaypat87/api/indeed11) to perform the most exhaustive search possible.
name: Linkedin Jobs Search
title: Linkedin Jobs Search

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search for jobs on Linkedin by specifying zipcode location, or city, state or just mention "United States" if you want all jobs matching a keyword.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://linkedin-jobs-search.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "linkedin-jobs-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://linkedin-jobs-search.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "linkedin-jobs-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
